quest_desc.qkname: In Search of a Shooting Star

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>A mission?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
Hello! Nice to see you again.
Actually, {user_nick}, I have a mission for you. Interested?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>(Accept Quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$In Search of a Shooting Star$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Pardon? A Phantom Thief…?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
There have been some strange rumors going around the Streets of Red Lotus Palace.
It seems a 'Phantom Thief' is running around impersonating my little puppy.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(… Helping the poor and downtrodden? Here in <FONT color=#7e12d2>Mistland</FONT>?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
Yes, a Phantom Thief. I asked around a little bit, and apparently this thief goes by the name
'Transformation Thief Shooting Star' and works to help the poor and downtrodden.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Would you mind taking care of this, <FONT color=#a82424>Vandar</FONT>?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
I have no problem with someone doing charity work,
but I'm a little worried because they keep causing trouble here and there in the process.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(To hear that there is supposed to be someone of good will in a place like Mistland does strike me as odd.)</html>
<html>Alright, leave it to me.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
He said he would take care of it, but I'm not sure it's in his wheelhouse.
He is not in the best condition…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I should head to the Streets.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
Thank you so much! You can expect a handsome reward for this. The person in question seems to frequent the Streets of Red Lotus Palace
. I'll go check there, too, but it would help to have an extra pair of eyes.
※ Go to Streets of Red Lotus Palace and look for anyone who has seen the Transformation Thief Shooting Star.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Huh? What is this about?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Pitiable Kid$
Daddy! Daddy, I missed you so much, Daddy!
How about it…? Mommy wants to see you too. Let's go!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(… Is this someone who was taken to the Exile place? How did they manage to come back like this?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Tired-looking Man$
Thanks to them, I was able to escape that hellish place.
Let's… Let's get out of here. Your father… All he needs in this world is you and your mother.
I shouldn't have been so greedy… What was I thinking, going to a place like the Arena…?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Hey, wait a minute.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Pitiable Kid$
It was all thanks to him. Mr. Shooting Star…
Let's go Daddy.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Unlike the child, the Tired-looking Man seems frightened.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Pitiable Kid$
Huh? Wh-, whoa, it's a master... from the Combat Tournament…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Don't worry. I just have a question to ask, is all.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Tired-looking Man$
Oh… Ar-, aren't you the warrior from the Southern Territory?
Please, Master Warrior… *Sobs*… I beg of you… Please pretend you didn't see me here?
I barely managed to escape that hellhole... and I cannot bear to return.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I won't have you detained. But in return, I want to ask you something.</html>
<html>If you answer me correctly, I will leave you be.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Tired-looking Man$
(Looks furtively at you.)
You won't detain me?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Tell me about this <FONT color=#a82424>Shooting Star</FONT>.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Tired-looking Man$
(Looks relieved.) Sure, what would you like to know?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Tell me about this <FONT color=#a82424>Shooting Star</FONT>.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Tired-looking Man$
(Looks frightened.) Please… *Sobs*… I beg of you.
I will answer any question you ask, just… Please...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Goodness… (It's not like I was planning on harming anyone specifically.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Pitiable Kid$
No, Daddy! We said we'd keep it a secret!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>... I won't hurt this... Shooting Star. Rest assured.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Tired-looking Man$
Forgive him! The child is still so young… I will… tell you whatever you need to know.
Sorry, son. I can't... I can't go back to that place.
I'm thankful he saved me, but it's not like I asked him specifically to do so.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>... Pardon?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Tired-looking Man$
Ah… What a relief. In the… Loser's Exile Place I could only wait for the day that I died.
But then this incredibly strong individual appeared. He called himself the Transformation Thief Shooting Star,
and said he would save me using the Power of the Star Lord.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No, <FONT color=#086171>before that</FONT>.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Tired-looking Man$
He said he would save me, and…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No, <FONT color=#a82424>after that</FONT>!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Tired-looking Man$
This incredibly strong individual appeared. He called himself the Transformation Thief Shooting Star...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yea, that part. He <FONT color=#a82424>really</FONT> said that?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Tired-looking Man$
Yes… The part about the Star, er, Power of the Star Lord… ?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Huh? Vice-captain? Of the mercenaries?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Tired-looking Man$
(Squints, thinking hard.)
Yes, and, um… He mentioned a cosmic… cosmic something or other…
Anyway, he looked a lot like the vice-captain of the Pymon Mercenaries…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Anyway, do you happen to know where I might find this so-called <FONT color=#a82424>Phantom Thief</FONT>?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Tired-looking Man$
Yes, Master Vandar. I used to be a mercenary myself at one point.
Which is why… I thought I had a chance in the Arena…
… I don't know why Master Vandar would do that for me… But I certainly am grateful.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Hm… I see. Thanks for the information.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Tired-looking Man$
(The man seems to be furtively looking this way.)
I… I don't know for sure, but… I think he might be helping more people like me.
You might find out more... in the Loser's Exile Place.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(I should go to Loser's Exile Place.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Pitiable Kid$
Let's go, Daddy. Let's go to Mommy.
I don't want us to be apart ever again.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(That's a relief. May the seed of resentment never grow within you...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Tired-looking Man$
Sure, let's get out of here…
We should escape before anyone finds me. Together…
I… I just can't become a vengeful ghost… Never…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Farewell. I hope you and your family have a good life.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Pitiable Kid$
Bye, Sir Warrior! We gotta go!
※ Go to the Loser's Exile Place and look for the Shooting Star.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Hey, he's been here the whole time? Was he chased here by <FONT color=#a82424>Hwaran</FONT>?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Monk Wangpung$
(Monk Wangpung, who was playing dead, flinched when you poked him.)
Oof?! Wh-, what day is it…?
And what are you doing here…?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(What's with this guy…?) No, it's nothing like that.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Monk Wangpung$
Please spare me! I have nothing by way of possessions. Don't be like that.
I barely made it here alive, and now I'm barely getting by, you know!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I didn't even know you were here.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Monk Wangpung$
(Monk Wangpung, splayed out on the ground praying, looks up at you furtively.)
You… You aren't here to… do away with me?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But, you said you'd track me down all the way here, didn't you?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Monk Wangpung$
(He seems extremely relieved.)
Then… You aren't here because of me. What a relief. Hahaha…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>People you know… Like, <FONT color=#a82424>Vandar</FONT>?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Monk Wangpung$
Well, you know, so many people I know have come by today,
I've been so flustered.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Different… clothes?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Monk Wangpung$
Right! That guy! But, that very same guy came by here twice wearing completely different clothing…
Actually, I think it was a different person altogether!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Pink?! (That must be the <FONT color=#a82424>Shooting Star</FONT>.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Monk Wangpung$
Yep, different clothes… They were pink clothes.
I thought to myself he must have picked up a new taste in fashion… and then I came here to hide.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(He must be referring to when he saved the child's father.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Monk Wangpung$
Anyway, I saw him and a shabbily dressed man leaving for the streets.
Saw it with my own two eyes.
So I thought I was safe…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>He didn't come back again after that?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Monk Wangpung$
Vandar didn't come back after that. Phew... I really thought I was done for!
(It seems Vandar really did come here looking for Shooting Star.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>… Understood. Then, I better be heading back.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Monk Wangpung$
That's right, so I was a little relieved, but then suddenly...!
The mercenary showed up again. I was so shocked!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(End conversation)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Monk Wangpung$
(Face lights up.)
Oh, you are leaving? Goodbye then!
※ Return to Streets of Red Lotus Palace and look for other witnesses.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I should ask this child.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
Oh, Mr. Phantom Thief, when will you return?
Oh, Mr. Phantom Thief~ Mr. Phantom Thief~ Please bring my doll to me~

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's nothing like that… I just wanted to ask you about that song you were just singing.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
Oh… What is it?
I don't have anything on me to give you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Okay, I think we might be on to something here. I should ask about the Phantom Thief.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
That's a song I just made up! Fun, huh?
Oh, Mr. Phantom Thief~ Mr. Phantom Thief~ Please bring my doll to me~
Don't lose your way~ Don't ever forget~ Please bring my doll to me~

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>(Receive Reward)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: Kanna's request
journal.contents:
Kanna, a healer who is said to be beholden to Vandar, suddenly says she wants to give you a mission. What the heck is going on? You should hear her out.

Red Lotus Palace Main Street-Healer Kanna
journal.destination: Talk to Healer Kanna at Red Lotus Palace Main Street
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Healer Kanna at Red Lotus Palace Main Street.

journal.title: Reunited Family
journal.contents:
Kanna speculated that there was some guy pretending to be Mercenary Vandar going around acting as he pleased. She figured she could just let Vandar take care of it on his own, but isn't the idea of a "Phantom Thief who helps the powerless" out of place in Mistland? It seems worth investigating, so you should look for witnesses in the Streets of Red Lotus Palace.

Streets of Red Lotus Palace- ???
journal.destination: Look for witnesses in the Streets of Red Lotus Palace
journal.todo_msg: Look for any witnesses in the Streets of Red Lotus Palace.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter
journal.contents:
Considering the boy and father you met on the streets, the one known as Shooting Star really does seem to be saving people. Moreover, it seems rumors of him having the same face as Mercenary Vandar are accurate. It was hard for them to talk about their benefactor easily, but anyway, you got the information you need, so head to the Loser's Exile Place and look around.

Red Lotus Palace Main Street (Red Lotus Palace Outskirts) - Loser's Exile Place (????)
journal.destination: Look for Shooting Star in Loser's Exile Place
journal.todo_msg: Look for Shooting Star in Loser's Exile Place.

journal.title: A Girl's Wish
journal.contents:
You unexpectedly met Monk Wangpung in Loser's Exile Place. It seems he has been eking out an existence in the Exile after being chased out of the Silver Treasure Vault. According to Monk Wangpung, the Shooting Star did not return after taking the boy's father out of the Exile. You should go back to the Streets and look for another witness.

Streets of Red Lotus Palace - ????
journal.destination: Look for a witness in the Streets of Red Lotus Palace
journal.todo_msg: Look for another witness in the Streets of Red Lotus Palace.
